sentence: All speakers echoed the remarks of Rep. Brian Fitzpatrick (R-Pa.), who praised federal workers as “dedicated and hard-working public servants that play an incredibly vital role in all of our communities and our nation.” His appearance demonstrated a level of federal workforce support uncommon among his Republican partisans but one informed by his experience as a federal prosecutor and FBI agent.
